welcomepage.pma-text: Project management application software is designed to plan and document, manage and control project tasks and activities, to-do lists and schedules.
welcomepage.about-author: Hi! My name is Liudmyla. I'm a student of the online course “Javascript/Front-end Mentoring Program (in English)” at the Rolling Scopes School. This webproject is the final task of the course.

forms.login-length: Login should be at least 3 characters
forms.pass-length: Password should be at least 6 characters
forms.name-length: Name should be at least 3 characters
